segments.text: that was a great party . Thanks for saying behind to help me clear up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it certainly was a great party . It ’ s a pity that a glass and a plate got broken and someone spilled a drink over here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I expected that something might get broken . That doesn ’ t bother me . That spilled drink won ’ t leave a stain , will it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I doubt it , I ‘ ll deal with it right away . Luckily it wasn ’ t a glass of red wine , I ’ ll just get a bowl of water and a cloth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m going to put all the rubbish into this big plastic bag .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: afterwards , we can do the washing up together . Everything will be finished within an hour . Your friend Keith is really funny . I liked his magic tricks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , he ’ s very good .. isn ’ t he ? He told some funny stories too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Amanda told some very funny jokes . At the beginning of the party , she was being ver serious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that she had a litter too much of the punch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what did you put in that punch ? It tasted great , but was quite strong .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that ’ s my little secret . Did you like the snacks and I prepared ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: very much . The birthday cake was delicious , wasn ’ t it ? Emily told me that she and karen made it themselves .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that cake tasted so good ! It disappeared within minutes , so I think everyone liked it a lot . How ’ s that stain ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: all cleaned up . Are you ready to start on the washing up .
segments.speaker: S2
